attributes.text:
@dev transfer ownership of this contract
@param g_ the new governance address

@dev called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user
@param amount the amount in BIOP to add to transfer to this user*

@dev calculate the staking time bonus (1x every 9 days)
@param lastStake timestamp of LPs last stake/claim*

@notice one time function used at deployment to configure the connected binary options contract
@param options_ the address of the binary options contract

constructor.details: init the contract (dont forget to also configure setupBinaryOptions afterwards, and deposit tokens)

params.launchTime: the length of the launch bonus multiplier (in seconds)

deposit(uint256).details: deposit tokens into the utilization rewards

params.total: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from multisig

distributeClaim(uint256).details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.amount: the amount in BIOP to add to transfer to this user*
the amount of value in bet
params.completion: false for bet, true for exercise expire*

getLPStakingBonus(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.lastInterchange: the total interchange the last time the LP staked/claimed
params.totalInterchange: amount interchanged since LPs last claim
params.totalStaked: the total amount staked by all LPs*

params.lastInterchange: the total interchange the last time the LP staked/claimed

getPoolBalanceBonus(uint256,uint256).details: calculate the bonus for % of total LP pool

params.totalLocked: the total amount staked by all LPs*

getStakingTimeBonus(uint256).details: calculate the staking time bonus (1x every 9 days)

params.options_: the address of the binary options contract

getOptionValueBonus(uint256,uint256).notice: bonus based  on total interchange. The more bet's are used, the more rewards.
